Posts.Content: iedh wrote: I just got bc IDC 3,3cm, grade 1 ER/PR+ 100%, inside there is DCIS 2cm,grade 2 and 1 sentinel node positive micrometastase. I will get radiation 20 times and chemo AC 4times, taxol 12 times and hormone terapi tamoxifen for 5-7years. Should I refuse chemo if my mammaprint result low? I need suggestion. Thank Dx 2/14/2018, DCIS/IDC, Left, 3cm, Grade 1, 1/1 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- (IHC) Surgery 4/26/2018 Lumpectomy: Left; Reconstruction (left) Radiation Therapy 6/5/2018 Whole-breast: Breast, Lymph nodes, Chest wall Hormonal Therapy 6/19/2018 Tamoxifen pills (Nolvadex, Apo-Tamox, Tamofen, Tamone) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Do I need chemo? iedh Dogwood1

Posts.Content: iedh wrote: I have IDC 3,3cm grade 1( inside DCIS 2cm, grade 2) with sentinel node micro. my Mammaprint test result came back with LOW RISK (+0,050) and Luminal A( +1.03), HER2 type -0,412, Basal type - 0,484 . ER/PR + 100%. I dont know what the Numbers mean. Before the mammaprint test came, my onco advised me to get chemo( 4 AC and 12 TAXOL). I am during 14th radiation now( from 20). No chemo. But i will be in tamoxifen for 10 years.
